Funtion.Detail: Catalysis of the transfer of a group, e.g. a methyl group, glycosyl group, acyl group, phosphorus-containing, or other groups, from one compound (generally regarded as the donor) to another compound (generally regarded as the acceptor). Transferase is the systematic name for any enzyme of EC class 2.
Interacting selectively and non-covalently with zinc (Zn) ions.

PDB.PDB_Title: Crystal structures of yrdA from Escherichia coli, a homologous protein of gamma-class carbonic anhydrases, show possible allosteric conformations
PDB.PubMed_Title: Structures of the gamma-class carbonic anhydrase homologue YrdA suggest a possible allosteric switch
PDB.Author: Park, H.M., et al.
